name: Aguara
description: A young Tepetlisaurus bearing the name "Cunning," distinguished by the white scarf tied to its tail. It has an adorable yet mischievous temperament. Upon arriving in the vast and open Realm Within, Aguara often embarks on adventures using its adept burrowing skills, forging bonds with the other lively creatures, such as the Flying Squirrels.\nIt is said that in Natlan, names hold special power. Perhaps Aguara has evaded past calamities under the protection of its name, "Cunning." May the name we bestowed upon this little one safeguard its journey ahead...
